channel.title: How to copy notes between instruments?
channel.description:
I have a feeling there’s an easy answer to this question, but I just can’t seem to figure it out. How do you copy the note data from a loop in one instrument and paste it into a new loop on another instrument, so you can get two instruments playing the same part without having to write it again a second time?
Duplicate only works within the same instrument, and the same for note copy and paste. Can anyone answer this?

item.title: How to copy notes between instruments?
item.dc:creator: GioMakyo
item.description:
Thanks, that worked! For some reason I thought move function was only within the same instrument!

Read full topic
item.source: How to copy notes between instruments?

item.title: How to copy notes between instruments?
item.dc:creator: Arimyth
item.description:
Locate the instrument and the loop you would like to copy note data from.
Tap and hold on the loop.
Press Duplicate.
You will have a copy of that loop on the same instrument. Drag the duplicated loop to a new instrument.

Read full topic
item.source: How to copy notes between instruments?
